tool_description: API that returns stupid quotes (in English and Brazilian) from database
name: Stupid Quotes
title: Stupid Quotes

api_list.name: Random
api_list.description: Return a random quote with original Brazilian and translated English versions.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stupid-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/api/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stupid-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
